text: Eraserhead is a 1977 American surrealist movie by David Lynch. It was the first feature movie made by Lynch. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1977 horror movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies about dreams Category:Movies about nightmares Category:American independent movies Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies directed by David Lynch Category:United States National Film Registry movies
title: Eraserhead
